sentences.sContent: The men took shelter in a bombed-out farmhouse.
sentences.sCn: 那些男人躲在一间被炸毁的农舍里。

sentences.sContent: All around me, people were running for shelter .
sentences.sCn: 我周围的人都在奔跑着寻找地方躲避。

sentences.sContent: ...a wooden house, sheltered by a low pointed roof.
sentences.sCn: …一座由低矮的尖屋顶遮蔽的木房子。

trans.tranOther: protection from danger or from wind, rain, hot sun etc
